query.name: CustomerNameIdQuery
query.label: Customer Name Id Query
query.description: Retrieves Lname | Fname | Id. Note inner join, hard coded table names.
query.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT customer.lname, customer.fname, customer.customer_id FROM sales_fact_1997 sales_fact_1997 INNER JOIN customer customer ON sales_fact_1997.customer_id = customer.customer_id ORDER BY customer.lname ASC, customer.fname ASC
